gui_qt module

School Management System - PyQt5 GUI

This module provides a PyQt5-based graphical user interface (GUI) for managing a school system. It supports:

  • Students

  • Instructors

  • Courses

  • Registrations

  • Search

  • Export/Backup

The system uses SQLite for persistence and JSON/CSV for import/export.

Author:

Marc Abou Nader

class gui_qt.TabStudents(*args: Any, **kwargs: Any)[source]

Bases: QWidget

Tab for managing students.

Provides a form and table to add, edit, delete, save, and load student records.

add()[source]

Add a new student to the database.

Raises:

Exception – If adding fails (e.g., duplicate ID)

Returns:

None

delete()[source]

Delete the selected student from the database.

Returns:

None

edit()[source]

Edit the selected student’s details.

Raises:

Exception – If update fails

Returns:

None

load_json()[source]

Load student records from a JSON file.

Opens a file dialog to choose the file. :return: None

on_sel(r, c)[source]

Fill the form fields when a table row is selected.

Parameters:

  • r (int) – Row index

  • c (int) – Column index

Returns:

None

refresh()[source]

Reload all students into the table from the database.

Returns:

None

save_json()[source]

Save student records to a JSON file.

Opens a file dialog to select the save location. :return: None
